item.title: Game Designer Hall of Fame
item.author: contact@recommend.games (Recommend.Games)
item.description: Spiel des Jahres 2024 nominations are just around the corner (watch this space for our annual predictions), but I wanted to take this opportunity for a look back over the history of the award. Specifically, I wanted to see which designers have been most successful at the Spiel des Jahres, Kennerspiel des Jahres and Kinderspiel des Jahres awards. The first red meeples were given out in 1979. Since 1989, the jury also awarded the Kinderspiel des Jahres for children’s games, initially as an annual special award, and from 2001 as its own award with the blue meeple.

item.title: How long is a game of High Society?
item.author: contact@recommend.games (Recommend.Games)
item.description: High Society is a classic bidding game by classic designer Dr Reiner Knizia, most recently released by Osprey Games with a wonderfully classic look: The general concept is quite simple: the players are members of said “high society” and are trying to outdo each other in showing off their wealth. The game is played over a series of rounds, and in each round, a card is revealed from a deck of 16 cards.
